alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Harding; Mora; San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 1:08AM MDT until June 23 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... Northwestern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... Southern Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 215 AM MDT. * At 107 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southwest of Roy, or 23 miles west of Mosquero, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Roy, Mills, Chicosa Lake State Park and Solano. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
